title: "top 2000 vs top 50"
author: "Laurens de Vries"
date: "2/15/2021"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(spotifyr)

```



```{r}
top2000 <- get_playlist_audio_features("", "1DTzz7Nh2rJBnyFbjsH1Mh")
top50 <- get_playlist_audio_features("", "37i9dQZEVXbKCF6dqVpDkS")

awards <-
  bind_rows(
    top2000 %>% mutate(category = "Top 2000"),
    top50 %>% mutate(category = "Top 50")
  )

awards %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = category, y = energy)) +
  geom_violin()

awards %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = category, y = acousticness)) +
  geom_violin()

awards %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = category, y = valence)) +
  geom_violin()

```
